problem_text: The area of \parallelogram A B C D is 150 square meters. The area of \parallelogram F G H J is 54 square meters. If \parallelogram A B C D \sim \parallelogram F G H J, find the scale factor of \parallelogram F G H J to \parallelogram A B C D.
compact_text: The area of \parallelogram ABCD is 150 square meters. The area of \parallelogram FGHJ is 54 square meters. If \parallelogram ABCD \sim \parallelogram FGHJ, find the scale factor of \parallelogram FGHJ to \parallelogram ABCD.
annotat_text: The area of $▱ A B C D$ is 150 square meters. The area of $▱ F G H J$ is 54 square meters. If $▱ A B C D \sim ▱ F G H J$, find the scale factor of $▱ F G H J$ to $▱ A B C D$.
